author: mlp_v65n6
content: Does anyone know if one of these URLs should not be running?  This one has data on ropsten https://beaconchain.ropsten.ethdevops.io/validators/eth1deposits but this one does not: https://ropsten.beaconcha.in/validators/eth1deposits  - i got linked to the second one from Ethereum staking launchpad Ropsten version but it appears to be broken... I had discovered the first one which is working elsewhere

author: mlp_v65n6
content: I have a validator (Prysm) waiting to enter Ropsten - getting message: INFO validator: Waiting for deposit to be observed by beacon node pubKey=<my key here> status=UNKNOWN_STATUS - Deposit is recognized on Eth1 side and my EL and CL beacon node running fine... Does anyone know how long it is taking for Validators to be admitted onto Ropsten?  Is there a long queue?

author: nishant0
content: It takes a while for the deposit to be voted in

author: mlp_v65n6
content: not too long ago ðŸ™‚ 46 minutes per the txn on ropsten etherscan.

author: mlp_v65n6
content: I had heard on consensus layer call a couple days ago something about voting problems on ropsten and new validators maybe not getting in - hopefully that is resolved now (?)

author: nishant0
content: Yeah you need to wait a while then

author: 0xsileo
content: Hi all, I made my deposit 10days ago, is it normal that my validator is not active yet ?

author: potuz
content: No, this is not normal, there's zero pending queue currently. Is this for mainnet? Apologies, thought I was in Prysm's server, if this is for Ropsten it may well be that is pending ðŸ™‚

author: 0xsileo
content: No, for the kiln testnet sorry I didn't specify

author: Deleted User
content: you can check your activation status here and see if your balance is increasing: https://kiln.beaconstate.info/eth/v1/beacon/states/head/validators/0xb845da40d85057d417bec20157fa780f9359d6e6b71eb7a1d38a9e03d5ba56fbb81482f39639cf38c4cb3c2e9af3c948 the kiln beaconchain explorer is not showing this correctly atm
